name: Leave Me Alone! (Exarpo)
description:
A cartoony 2D game where you play as a character trying to live a peaceful life in the city.

But city life is not easy. The ever increasing population poses various problems to your daily life - being stuck in traffic, not being able to sleep at night due to the loud traffic outside, or not being able to casually retrieve a briefcase from a suspicious character in the subway...

The fact that you're not alone is starting to bother you so it is time to do something about it! Solve problems by searching your surroundings for characters and items and finding crazy and fun solutions!

Music/sound effect from https://pixabay.com/.
